title: About
body:
Some say we never sleep, and that we roams around the lanes of insti at night foraging for cows. 

Some say we are a bunch of nerds who smell nice when take bath and act like semi-guide for graduate thesis projects.

Some say we are confused most of the times and take pride in not knowing what to do in the research topic.

But we know for sure that we love Mendeley, LaTex, Text, Atlas.TI and Web of Science. 

\\//,
